text: Aymeline Valade (born 17 October 1984) is a French model and actress. ==Early life== Born in Montpellier, Valade grew up in Lyon, Paris and Nice. She learned how to read at age 11. and knows how to skate.http://www.complex.com/style/2012/08/model-aymeline-valade-lands- skateboard-tricks-in-new-editorial She was noticed by an agent at the age of 15, while she was skating in Nice. However she decided not to try modeling and instead, studied journalism and communication. At age 22, she decided to go to Paris and started her career as a model. Her first fashion show during fashion week, for Balenciaga, was her breakthrough in fashion. ==Career== As a model. she has done more than 200 fashion shows, including Chanel (17 times), Chloé, Dolce & Gabbana, Emilio Pucci, Louis Vuitton, Marc Jacobs, Marni and Versace. In 2014, she played Betty Catroux in Saint Laurent. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Role !
